CONVERSATION GROUP:
BK too many ....'s!
I don't think that's the question, Raiiel. It's do we have to start there?....
[The half-elf notices you have been hearing their conversation. She pauses as she looks at you.]
Sounds like you both need some help?
Why do you want to get into Luskan?
...I can take on anyone in the slums!
Of course! High Captain Throa Taerl, a woman leading a gang full of pirates... how can you not get excited about that!?
That's right! But first we need to find a place to stay that is safe for us.
Raiiel is so passionate about this I won't stand in her way, I want her to follow her dream. We just need to find a safe place to stay in Luskan.
Would it be possible for me to find a vacant loft in Luskan for you two?
Yes, but I'd prefer to keep that low-key. Not a lot of business for that when no one trusts signatures anymore....

BK this line seemed really unnatural
True! Traveler, if you do find proof of a vacant loft... let us know.
In that case... I think I could work with this!
Look closer. We have an address... and the landlord's signature. I can forge a deed out of this!
The owner of the letter is no longer around.
I found it off of someone's body.
[Alima and Raiiel embrace each other out of excitement. They both look at you with the biggest of smiles.]
We're eternally grateful, traveler! Look for us in Luskan if you ever need any help. I don't ever leave my debts unpaid.
Now, I don't just do nice deeds expecting no reward...
[Raiiel still can't believe your kindness as you hand over the coins.]
Of course, as soon as we can. Thank you, traveler. You should visit us sometime when we move in!
We've been enjoying Luskan... but these slums sure have seemed more dangerous than I even imagined.
Inside we found some leftovers from whoever previously lived here. I still don't think it is enough to repay you, but please take this!
[Alima slowly raises her eyes up to you. She's making eye contact, but it doesn't feel like she's staring at you.]
